name: Turmeric Spinach Golden Lentil Dal - Red Lentil Soup
description: Turmeric Spinach Golden Lentil Dal - Red Lentil Soup. Easy Lentil Soup with turmeric and greens. No garlic no onion Dhal. Golden Lentil Dal with Bengali Panch phoron spices. Vegan Gluten-free Soy-free Recipe.
recipeIngredient: 1/2 cup red lentils (washed and drained well)
1 cup chopped or baby spinach ( or quick cooking baby greens)

recipeInstructions.text: Wash the lentils and drain and keep aside.
recipeInstructions.name: Wash the lentils and drain and keep aside.

recipeInstructions.text: Heat oil in a saucepan over medium heat. When the oil is hot, add the whole spices in the order, Mix and let them start to pop.
recipeInstructions.name: Heat oil in a saucepan over medium heat. When the oil is hot, add the whole spices in the order, Mix and let them start to pop.

recipeInstructions.text: Add turmeric and cayenne and give it a quick mix. Add the washed and drained lentils, mix and roast for a minute. At this point, you can add in finely chopped veggies of choice.
recipeInstructions.name: Add turmeric and cayenne and give it a quick mix. Add the washed and drained lentils, mix and roast for a minute. At this point, you can add in finely chopped veggies of choice.

recipeInstructions.text: Add water and salt and mix in. Partially cover and cook for 15 to 20 minutes or until lentils are cooked to preference.
recipeInstructions.name: Add water and salt and mix in. Partially cover and cook for 15 to 20 minutes or until lentils are cooked to preference.

recipeInstructions.text: Fold in the spinach or baby greens. Taste and adjust salt and heat. Simmer for 2 minutes or so. You can also add in 1 chopped tomatoes at this point.

recipeInstructions.text: Serve as soup or over rice.
